name: Float Health
headline: the marketplace for Specialty Pharma
description: Float brings a nurse to your home when you’re sick. If you have a chronic illness, instead of making you come to an overcrowded hospital full of sick people, we bring the best of the hospital to you.

founders.name: Ryan Johnson, Founder
founders.description:
ER Nurse with 20y in healthcare at bedside and in leadership.
Co-founded coffee roasting company with online sales and delivery.
I can also ride bikes.

founders.name: Christy Johnson, Founder
founders.description:
Natural salesperson that establishes credibility and develops lasting relationships with customers.
Founded an events management business and co-founded a marketing subscription platform.
Can also jazzercise.

# On-demand home infusion nurses
Access to the best nurses when you need them, straight to your patients’ homes. 
[Start sending referrals](http://float.health/</demo>)
![](http://float.health/_astro/pharma-ui.DT6F9gYu_Z1FXrPA.webp)
##  Meaningful care impactful results 
Visits
35k+
And growing every day
Medication Completion
+180%
Compared to typical home infusion patient
Staffing Rate
98-100%
Every week
Time to Staff
Minutes
Instead of days to weeks with other nursing sources
## How it works
1 
Specialty Pharmacies send home infusion therapy patient referrals to Float Health for nursing services 
2 
Float Health secures highly qualified nurses for patients, ensuring each patient can receive the treatment needed to keep them healthy 
3 
Patients receive exceptional care from their Float Health nurse throughout their home infusion therapy 
![](http://float.health/_astro/gauge.BCjCftJD_11PAXS.webp)
## Reliable Care
Float nurses have the expertise that leads to exceptional patient retention and near-zero supply waste. Better medication compliance keeps each patient healthy and happy, all while increasing pharmacy revenue. 
![](http://float.health/_astro/coin.Di9PW4tu_Z11EzfD.webp)
## Cost-effective
Our technology reduces admin burden and expedites reimbursement while reducing chart bounceback. Leveraging Float for nursing services allows your pharmacy to reduce operational costs compared to managing in-house nursing or using nurse agencies. 
![Alpida](http://float.health/_astro/alpida._4C7DHJU_21KAyg.webp)![Biotek](http://float.health/_astro/biotek.BKtHBz2B_Z2ipVlN.webp)![Eversana](http://float.health/_astro/eversana.o-_MRDM__ZGfg2o.webp)![MedRx Infusion](http://float.health/_astro/medrx.B-wFbRoa_2aTQoD.webp)![Orsini Specialty Pharmacy](http://float.health/_astro/orsini.DrFAwSeV_Z1K4bFK.webp)![CVS Health](http://float.health/_astro/cvs.BrFm7sop_ZByLnG.webp)![Optum](http://float.health/_astro/optum.DYwjs8Ub_29caIX.webp)![Option Care Health](http://float.health/_astro/option-care-health.CvkjjAdh_ZmnVbr.webp)![Premier Infusion Care](http://float.health/_astro/premier-infusion.CcvN11UM_Z5PfIQ.webp)![Owl Specialty Pharmacy](http://float.health/_astro/owl-sp.C5LOa2WO_ZtkIiN.webp)![APS Healthcare](http://float.health/_astro/aps.t8a3vR0s_ZAAqDT.webp)![Care Fusion Rx](http://float.health/_astro/care-fusion.DRdI79Pi_Z14NxTu.webp)![Healthtopia](http://float.health/_astro/healthtopia.DnRFuRUk_1FuWNC.webp)![Nufactor](http://float.health/_astro/nufactor.Cz417Dqp_Z23aRcP.webp)![River's Edge Pharmacy](http://float.health/_astro/rivers.BON_Iu0y_ZQMghQ.webp)![AvevoRx](http://float.health/_astro/avevorx.B9uVPEv__Z2fyR3c.webp)![Complete Infusion Care](http://float.health/_astro/cic.BcJk97qH_ZWNvLY.webp)![KabaFusion](http://float.health/_astro/kabafusion.KcUNw44v_ZoXl2N.webp)![Owl Infusion Services](http://float.health/_astro/owl.D1T7Ssrp_1JJWMk.webp)![Soleo Health](http://float.health/_astro/soleo.CAxk3QKz_1fgpXs.webp)![Biomatrix](http://float.health/_astro/biomatrix.213P9He4_2atag3.webp)![MedicoRx Specialty](http://float.health/_astro/medicorx.lncSESHE_1Xhe6.webp)![Premier Pharmacy Services](http://float.health/_astro/pps.C4D2SetW_Z1SCBhm.webp)![WellScript](http://float.health/_astro/wellscript.DpYEDhMm_Z2n648t.webp)
![Alpida](http://float.health/_astro/alpida._4C7DHJU_21KAyg.webp)![Biotek](http://float.health/_astro/biotek.BKtHBz2B_Z2ipVlN.webp)![Eversana](http://float.health/_astro/eversana.o-_MRDM__ZGfg2o.webp)![MedRx Infusion](http://float.health/_astro/medrx.B-wFbRoa_2aTQoD.webp)![Orsini Specialty Pharmacy](http://float.health/_astro/orsini.DrFAwSeV_Z1K4bFK.webp)![CVS Health](http://float.health/_astro/cvs.BrFm7sop_ZByLnG.webp)![Optum](http://float.health/_astro/optum.DYwjs8Ub_29caIX.webp)![Option Care Health](http://float.health/_astro/option-care-health.CvkjjAdh_ZmnVbr.webp)![Premier Infusion Care](http://float.health/_astro/premier-infusion.CcvN11UM_Z5PfIQ.webp)![Owl Specialty Pharmacy](http://float.health/_astro/owl-sp.C5LOa2WO_ZtkIiN.webp)![APS Healthcare](http://float.health/_astro/aps.t8a3vR0s_ZAAqDT.webp)![Care Fusion Rx](http://float.health/_astro/care-fusion.DRdI79Pi_Z14NxTu.webp)![Healthtopia](http://float.health/_astro/healthtopia.DnRFuRUk_1FuWNC.webp)![Nufactor](http://float.health/_astro/nufactor.Cz417Dqp_Z23aRcP.webp)![River's Edge Pharmacy](http://float.health/_astro/rivers.BON_Iu0y_ZQMghQ.webp)![AvevoRx](http://float.health/_astro/avevorx.B9uVPEv__Z2fyR3c.webp)![Complete Infusion Care](http://float.health/_astro/cic.BcJk97qH_ZWNvLY.webp)![KabaFusion](http://float.health/_astro/kabafusion.KcUNw44v_ZoXl2N.webp)![Owl Infusion Services](http://float.health/_astro/owl.D1T7Ssrp_1JJWMk.webp)![Soleo Health](http://float.health/_astro/soleo.CAxk3QKz_1fgpXs.webp)![Biomatrix](http://float.health/_astro/biomatrix.213P9He4_2atag3.webp)![MedicoRx Specialty](http://float.health/_astro/medicorx.lncSESHE_1Xhe6.webp)![Premier Pharmacy Services](http://float.health/_astro/pps.C4D2SetW_Z1SCBhm.webp)![WellScript](http://float.health/_astro/wellscript.DpYEDhMm_Z2n648t.webp)
> “We are VERY happy with Float. Float is our #1 go to company to staff because your turn around is excellent and you do things thoroughly and timely.”
Pauline
Pharmacy Employee
## Provide the best care to your patients — use Float
Float nurses bring hospital-expertise to the home. They are the best at starting IVs, accessing ports, and caring for ports. Our nurses have experience with biologics/biosimilars, chemo, and all routine medications. They bring technical expertise and clinical teaching skills to every patient they see. 
![](http://float.health/_astro/float-buoy.DpyfIZET_C2dUo.webp)
##  Pharmacies, Payers, and Prescribers: Request a Demo of Float 
Learn how Float can help you efficiently staff your specialty pharmacy visits

generated_description:
Float Health, founded in 2021 in Carlsbad, CA, is a standout player in the health-tech landscape, particularly noted for connecting specialty pharmacies with on-demand home infusion nursing services. As a part of Y Combinator's W22 batch, they've taken an innovative approach to healthcare by bridging the gap between hospital-level care and the convenience of home treatment.

The company's initial service, known simply as Float, aimed to revolutionize how patients cope with chronic illnesses. Instead of hauling patients to sometimes crowded hospitals, Float brings qualified nurses to their homes, providing the necessary medical care right where they are most comfortable. This commitment to home care is not just about convenience; it's about enhancing patient experience and outcomes.

Float Health’s unique model is structured around specialty pharmacies. They manage to secure top-notch nursing staff quickly, typically staffing within minutes instead of the days or weeks it might take through traditional agencies. This agility has resulted in impressive metrics: they have conducted over 35,000 home visits and boast a medication completion rate 180% higher than typical home infusion patients, coupled with a staggering staffing success rate of 98-100%.

In terms of financial efficiency, Float Health is equally compelling — their tech-driven solutions reduce administrative burdens for pharmacies and streamline reimbursement processes. This results in cost savings compared to managing in-house nursing teams or relying on external agencies.

With a small, dedicated team of three, and notable backing from Michael Seibel as a group partner, Float Health is making a mark as a trusted partner for pharmacies, healthcare payers, and prescribers alike. They promise reliable, high-quality care without the waste — both in terms of resources and time.

If you're interested in exploring how Float Health can enhance your pharmacy services or bring expert care to your patients’ homes, you might want to check out their services on their website: [Float Health](http://float.health). As they continue to grow and get the word out, Float Health is positioning itself as a leader in the home healthcare digital space, and it’s worth keeping an eye on their journey.
